mentionedBy.name: Samsara
mentionedBy.notes: Formerly KeepTruckin, Motive offered an all-in-one platform with robust ELD compliance, asset tracking, and driver safety tools. Strong competitor in the transportation sector with emphasis on regulatory compliance and driver safety.

mentionedBy.name: Samsara
mentionedBy.notes: All-in-one platform emphasizing ELD compliance, asset tracking, and driver safety. Provides services including fleet management, equipment monitoring, spend management, and AI vision solutions. Filed patent infringement lawsuit against Samsara in 2024 over AI dashcam technology.

2020.note: Formerly KeepTruckin, Motive offered an all-in-one platform with robust ELD compliance, asset tracking, and driver safety tools. Strong competitor in the transportation sector with emphasis on regulatory compliance and driver safety.

2024.note: All-in-one platform emphasizing ELD compliance, asset tracking, and driver safety. Provides services including fleet management, equipment monitoring, spend management, and AI vision solutions. Filed patent infringement lawsuit against Samsara in 2024 over AI dashcam technology.
